# This code was used manipulate data the older mtDNA dataset.

## Set working directory
```{r}
setwd("~/EEB_2016-2018/mtDNA")
```

## Load libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
```


## Formatting for Structure
```{r}
mtDNA1 <- read_csv("Sheepnose MTDNA_genalex.csv")

mtDNA2 <- mtDNA1[,-c(2)]
names(mtDNA2) <- c("Sample", "Sequence")
mtDNA3 <- mtDNA2[-c(1:2),]
mtDNA3 <- mtDNA3[order(mtDNA3$Sample),]
write.csv(mtDNA3, "mtDNA_old.csv")
```
